thread.title: Altitude Trampoline Park Opening Soon in Laredo, TX
thread.title_full: Altitude Trampoline Park Opening Soon in Laredo, TX - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Altitude Trampoline Park Opening Soon in Laredo, TX
text:
Fort Worth, TX based Vertical LLC, d.b.a. Altitude Trampoline Park, has announced an agreement is in place for a 23,000 sq. ft. facility in, Laredo, Texas at 6019 McPherson Rd, Laredo, Tx 78045
Laredo, Texas (PRWEB) October 24, 2015
Fort Worth, TX based Vertical LLC., d.b.a. Altitude Trampoline Park, has announced an agreement is in place for a 23,000 sq. ft. facility in Laredo, TX. Company officials state that facility preparations on site have begun and they expect to have the newest Altitude location in full operation early 2016. Altitude Laredo will have large party rooms and plenty of in-park party areas for birthdays, corporate team outings, church groups, sports teams or any size group.
“We expect this indoor trampoline park to add 50 or more-part time, as well as several full time jobs to the Laredo, Texas area.” – Curt Skallerup, Altitude- President/CEO.
Altitude Trampoline Park – Laredo will be the first indoor trampoline park in the area. The indoor park will include a variety of activities such as Dodgeball, Basketball Dunking Lanes, Kid Zone, Foam Pits, Gymnastics “tumble tracks,” as well as a huge main court.
“Our parks offer state of the art equipment, high energy entertainment at affordable prices for families, groups and more. Altitude Trampoline Park places a sharp focus on providing a safe, clean, family friendly environment that will set our park apart.” – Jeff Rutten- Altitude- COO.
Altitude Trampoline Parks domestic operations are in Fort Worth, TX, Billerica, MA, San Antonio, TX, Little Rock, AR, Bossier City, LA, Rochester, NY and Monroe, LA. Altitude Trampoline Park opened their first international park in Slough, England in September of this year. Opening now are locations in Grapevine, TX, Glen Carbon, IL, Chicago, Il, Lubbock, TX, Katy, TX and Austin, TX with several others scheduled for 2016 in O’Fallon, MO, Jacksonville, FL, and Houston, TX. Altitude has additional international openings for 2016 in Japan, UK, and Puerto Rico.
Visit our website at http://altitudetrampolinepark.com/laredo/ for employment information, opening dates and birthday party reservations. Like us on our Facebook page Altitude Trampoline Park – Laredo to see exciting park developments and special information on our grand opening festivities coming this fall.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13033538.htm
